Summary: big fireball. meteor like came down our street
trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were no other sightings in San Francisco on or around February 5th 1977
divs: Sighting DetailsSince i can remember I used to wake up to a burning sensation as if someone had a lighter to under my nose. when i was a kid I had my nose vessels broken.... Doctors said from blowing to hard....Then I have some tiny thing in my right ear. I have always felt it and if you "try "to find it and place it. It feels as if it moves away. So the story is I was going to bed on night we lived on Mangels St. in San Francisco I was in my bed trying to sleep lights off maybe counting sheep. I remember a big bright light outside . We live on a street that started of at a hill. The fireball came down the hill. I was paralyzed. I tried to scream out to my brother who was sleep in the bed next to me but no words would come out. I tried to fight the feeling of not be able to move... My favorite classic car is a 56' chevy impala, low rider I pictured myself in that car. Flying.. I go blank after that. I woke up to to a panic scream. The lighter thing has happened quite a few times .
